response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and potential for you. I understand its worth to you is $800,000. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your appreciation and commitment to our product. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
